column4: I would like candidates to write about their experiences (e.g. blog, writing columns in The Ubyssey)
column5: I think the AMS currently does enough consultation with students
column6: I want more face-to-face time with elected candidates
column7: I think the AMS's most important job is engaging students
column8: I value management experience in a candidate
column9: I think it's a good thing for a candidate to have experience within a specific political party, even if they might have to lobby that party's opponents
column10: I think the AMS should focus on lobbying for the Broadway subway line extension to UBC more than alternate transit fixes
column11: I think that campaigns encouraging students to vote in the gov elections are valuable
column12: I think candidates should have experience lobbying for student interests
column13: I value the prioritization of diversity in every aspect of decision-making
column14: I think the AMS should focus more on events
column15: I'm in favour of repealing the arts language requirement
column16: I think Block Party should be bigger, at a bigger financial risk
column17: I think that the AMS should explore more options for campus security.
column18: I think that the AMS should prioritize eradicating bike theft
column19: I think the AMS should prioritize getting more people out to Thunderbirds games
column20: I value experience in creating and understanding university policies
column21: I value a constant push for transparency within the bodies of UBC
column22: I value a candidate that is well-versed in UBC's sexual assault policy
column23: I think that the AMS should invest their money at a slightly higher risk for a larger financial gain
column24: I think that extending the add-drop deadline would improve student mental health
column25: I am satisfied with the current amount of mental health services on campus
column26: I support continued advocacy for more athletics and recreation space on campus
column27: I think current VP Finance Louis Retief has done a good job of managing the AMS's finances this year
column28: I would like to see a quarterly report of the AMS's finances
column29: I value a fresh perspective over relevant experience
column30: It's important for my representatives to have close ties to the Greek system
column31: I think student representation on Senate has been good this year
column32: It's important for my representatives to have prior AMS or constituency (AUS, EUS, etc.) experience
column33: It's important for my representatives to have experience working with others
column34: I think a "steady hand" is more important than shaking things up
